Isabella Rodriguez.description: [(ID:fdTtw3) Monday February 13 -- 02:00 PM] Activity: Isabella is continuing to serve customers at the cafe counter (1) Isabella is serving customers at the cafe counter) @ the Ville:Isabella Rodriguez's apartment:main room:closet

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about <fill in> Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller discussing Klaus's research on the effects of gentrification and arranging to meet for coffee to discuss it further @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hi Klaus, I noticed you're still working on your research. How's it going?
Klaus Mueller
It's going well, thanks for asking! I'm making good progress on my paper about the effects of gentrification in low-income communities. How about you, how's your physics lecture going?
Maria Lopez

That's great, I'm glad to hear you're making progress. Physics has been really interesting so far, we're covering some complex topics but I'm enjoying the challenge. Say, would you be interested in grabbing a coffee later and discussing your research more? I'd love to learn more about it.
Klaus Mueller
That sounds great, I'd be happy to discuss my research with you over coffee later. I'd enjoy getting your perspective on the topic.
Maria Lopez
That's wonderful, I'd love to learn more. What time works best for you to meet up?
Klaus Mueller
How about we meet up at Hobbs Cafe around 4pm? That should give us enough time to chat before I have to head back and finish my paper.
Maria Lopez
Great, 4pm at Hobbs Cafe sounds perfect. I'll see you then!
